attributes.title: This is disgusting and sick
attributes.review:
First thing when I downloaded this I see a picture of trump bald and naked and I’m like “oh it may have gotten hacked” then I keep looking through the app and my brother gets real freaky and is saying stuff like “TrUmP iS hAnDsOmE i LoVe HiM “ and other stuff like “TrUmP 2020 wE WiLl BuIlD a WaLL tO sToP mExIcAnS “ next thing ya know the fbi pull up so don’t download this it’s pretty crazy and has a lot of trump being bald and naked photos
With wrinkly skin and like it’s just horrible

I am horrified. I downloaded this app with high hopes, but when I opened it I was met with the terrifying image of Donald Trump naked and being spray tanned. It was the size of a baby shrimp, and his balls were much too large. I was under the impression his carrot-like complexion was completely natural, and was absolutely betrayed when I saw the image. Not only that horrible image, but I also found out that he is neglecting and holding his son captive. I am disgusted, disappointed, and horrified. ❤️

Honestly I wasn't expecting to see what I saw when I opened the app.. it's really disgusting. I was expecting a Trump Subway Surfer type game for my 3 yr old to play, but we opened the app and were flashed with some guy with no clothes on getting a spray tan.. my daughter is traumatized. I cant get the image out of my head.. it's been hours and she is still crying. If you don't want to be traumatized I suggest not downloading the app. Please take this off the app store!! 😿😿😿😿😿😿😿😿😿😿😿

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: I down loaded this app to stay updated on today’s news and all I saw was fake news about how people are being violent and about how the black lives matter movement is violent. I really expected more out of this app especially since it’s news FROM THE PRESIDENT. In addition to all of that the articles seemed very racist. I will never use this app again, nor will I recommend it to anyone. If I could give it 0 stars I would. Too bad I can’t.

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: This app is all over the place. Way too confusing and honestly see no purpose the this app. I tried using it, and I just couldn’t. i couldn't stand to see this person all over the app. Also making me agree to all these privacy reasons. The fact that theres points involved just makes so sense. this app truly serves no purpose. I do not recommend wasting your time downloading this horrible app.

attributes.title: My point is
attributes.review: Oh my goodness. This app has horrible quality and it is just not okay! Sadly my pet floor really died after seeing the orange light coming from the screen! My eyes were blinded by that weird looming man on the screen!?  But hat is not it. I scrolled down more and more on this app and saw the most disgusting picture I have ever since! It was a deformed orange on the screen! I was horrified! I passed out and had to go to the er. I am so disappointed in this awful app!

attributes.title: You will lose everything 🤤🤤😪
attributes.review: After downloading the app I fell asleep 😴and my skin started to get 🧯 irritated. When I woke up my hand started to look 👀 a little funny but it was too dark 🌚 to tell, so I went to my bathroom and tuned the💡on. SO BASICALLY I turned in a orange deformed lanky Cheeto my parents disowned and now I’m sad. This app ruined my life because of it I lost my 👨‍👩‍👧‍👧family, three imaginary husbands, and my looks good thing Fenty has a foundation in my shade so that’s a plus 🌸💐🌷

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: Yo this app is such trash. It keeps freezing and crashing. Also trumps nudes were leaked on here and my 3 year old son saw it. I am so appalled. I downloaded this app to stay up to date with our president but I was very much disappointed with the content and the way it runs. The App Store needs to take this application down immediately, if not I will put in a complaint. The content is disgusting and I will tell my friends in the office about it.
